"Girls, let me go right now!" yelled Sophie, her body enclosed in the little girl's hand. "It talks - it moves," said the older girl philosophically. "Ow!" said the younger sister as Sophie, struggling to get free, kicked her in the pinky finger.

1223.content:
With a little effort, you struggled painfully to your feet. Your entire body was sore with agony, and you were tired and embarrassed. You tried to wipe the tears out of your eyes, but they just kept flowing. Your perfect day had been ruined. Your dress was ripped to shreds, your makeup was a mess, and no one knew you where you were. No one, except the last person you wanted to see.

"Aw." A voice boomed from behind you. You whirled around to see the giant face of Ashlie, your worst nightmare. "Is someone having a bad time? Let me tell you, I saw everything that just happened, and it was hilarious!"

"Why didn't you stop them?" You yelled at her. Ashlie leaned closer, and whispered.

"Because I love seeing you suffer." Suddenly, she snatched you up tightly. Despite your protests, she carried you uncaringly into the kitchen right next door to the changing room. Once inside, Ashlie threw you into the sink. Immediately, you tried to climb out, but the walls were too high and too slippery. Ashlie looked down at you with delight.

"What are you doing Ashlie?" You cried. "Please just take me to Emma!"

"Oh you'll get to Emma eventually. Just you wait. I have a plan. Oh! And don't think of yelling for help. No one is here except for me." With that, Ashlie turned on the faucet, and boiling water rained down onto your head. You screamed in torment as the skin burning water scorched your entire self. You also felt your body hardening, an effect of hot water on your body. Within a minute, you were frozen and unable to move. Ashlie smirked, and lifted you out of the water. She dropped you on the counter and left you to dry. She walked out of view, but came back a few seconds later with a doll in her hand. With horror, you realized the doll she was holding was the doll version of you that went on the cake!

"You've probably figured it out by now." Ashlie grinned. "I'm switching you to take the dolls place on your own wedding cake. Of course, in your hardened form, you basically are a doll!" Ashlie pulled off the clothes on the fake doll and then deposited the doll in the trash can. She then lifted you up, and began dressing you in the dolls papery wedding gown. You were helpless as Ashlie fit you into the dolls dress and shoes. Ashlie even applied glue to the clothing, to make sure it wouldn't come off.

Ashlie then picked up a small comb and straightened your hair in the exact same style as the dolls. She also pulled out her makeup kit and redid your makeup so you would look exactly as the doll had. Lastly, she stretched your mouth out into a beaming smile, and your face was stuck that way. When Ashlie finally finished, you looked exactly like the doll, no matter how closely anyone looked at you. You had absolutely no idea what you were going to do to get out of this situation.

"Perfect!" Ashlie cheered. "You look so cute Sophie!" Ashlie gently carried you over to your wedding cake, and placed you on top beside the doll of Emma. She pushed your feet into the icing a little bit so you would stick. Then, she blew you a kiss, and skipped out of the kitchen.

For the next fifteen minutes, you could do nothing but stand there and look pretty, just as Ashlie had set you up. You couldn't even cry any tears, as your frozen body was incapable of doing that. You hated Ashlie with all your heart for ruining the most important day of your life. If you ever got out of this, you would make her pay. All you could hope for now was for your body to fight off the effects of the water and unharden.

Twenty minutes later, the door to the kitchen swung open, and the chef entered. She was a young, attractive girl in her 20s. She walked over to the cart that the wedding cake was sitting on, and began pushing it out of the kitchen. Halfway out of the kitchen, she paused and looked right at you.

This was your chance! If you could somehow give her a sign that you were real, all your problems would be gone! You try to blink, move, or talk...anything! But what happens?

1431.content:
Emma was worried about where Sophie had gotten to. She knew Ashlie was here, and her sister had been the one assigned to bring the tiny bride to the Church so she knew she was here somewhere, but as of yet she hadn’t caught any glimpses of the little woman. It was supposed to be bad luck to see the bride before the wedding, but the blonde couldn’t help but feel it was even worse luck not to see her in these circumstances. After all, Sophie had a nasty habit of getting herself into trouble.

The bride-to-be was about ready to give up on her search for now when her eyes were drawn to the bridesmaids changing on the other side of the room. More specifically they were drawn to the shapely figure of her good friend Jasmine as the tanned woman struggled to work her excessively clingy bridesmaid’s dress down over her curves. It was unnecessary really, they could have had a dress made that would perfectly fit the brunette’s particular ‘dimensions’, but she’d insisted on a size that was far too small, convinced that she’d fit and look all the better for it.

Not that Emma was complaining really. She loved Sophie with all her heart but she still couldn’t help but admire the way that Jasmine’s massive derriere was swaying side to side as she slowly worked the dress over her generous chest. The poor pantyhose was pulled impossibly tight as it struggled to contain the rippling mounds of flesh, which the bridesmaid somehow intended to shove into the skin-tight dress she was pulling inexorably closer. The black pantyhose were a stark contrast to the cream-white dress, the only imperfection the small white smear on her friend’s right cheek.

Actually, that smear almost looked like…

“Jasmine! STOP!!” To everyone who wasn’t Emma the sudden scream came out of nowhere, catching everyone, especially Jasmine, off guard. In fact the tanned woman was so surprised that she lost her already tenuous footing, still half-tangled in her own dress as she came crashing to the ground, landing heavily on her rear and utterly obliterating Sophie under her unforgiving mass.

“Ow, Emma what the hell?” Sore from the fall, Jasmine wiggled her butt into the floor, trying to rub out some of the lingering soreness and unknowingly adding to the torment she had already inflicted on the tiny bride. “If I tore my dress I swear I’ll… Hey!”

Emma wanted to cry as she saw her friend crushing her little love. Dashing forward and ignoring Jasmine’s protests she pulled the other girl to her feet, forcibly turning her around and reaching down to rip Sophie from her massive cheek. Shocked by her actions, the bridesmaid didn’t even have time to struggle as the blonde’s nails peeled off one of her fiancé’s legs, and with a single yank peeled her bride from her impromptu prison.

For Sophie she felt like she had been liberated from hell and brought into heaven. After being crushed mercilessly by the bridesmaids’ butts, up to and including being farted on, she’d been about ready to give up on ever escaping that hell. But then Emma had swooped in and saved her from her torment. Her body was badly crushed and mangled, and she was taking longer than usual to reform, but as she looked up at her bride-to-be’s tearful face she felt like she was looking at a goddess.

Of course, Emma wasn’t the only goddess around, and the others weren’t quite as benevolent.

Finally getting back to her senses, Jasmine pulled free from her friend’s grip and whirled around to face her attacker. Behind her the other bridesmaids looked on worryingly, confused by the bride’s unexpectedly violent behaviour. “The hell are you doing!? That hurt!”

“Look!” Frustrated herself, Emma thrust her hand towards Jasmine’s face, displaying the still partially reformed Sophie for all to see. “You were sitting on my wife!” She shook her hand for emphasis, unintentionally rattling her precious partner as she let her anger override her better judgement and usual protectiveness towards her tiny love.

Jasmine glared down at the squished doll of a woman with a look that could melt steel, while her fellow bridesmaids only looked more confused at Emma’s declaration. “Is that what this is about? Some stupid doll?! If you don’t want your stuff to get sat on don’t leave it lying around!”

“She’s not a doll you idiot, she’s my fiancé!” The larger bride was really starting to lose it now, angrily shaking her hand at Jasmine with little concern for its passenger. Still mostly malformed, Sophie gripped to her partner’s fingers as tightly as she could, scared that she was going to be shook off at any moment and lost once again among the sea of bridesmaids that were slowly closing in around the arguing pair. She tried to call up to Emma but found she still couldn’t speak through her crushed throat, and could only look up in fear as the two giant women loomed over her.

The argument between Emma and Jasmine was reaching a breaking point when…

14311.content:
For a brief moment the two giant woman seemed like they were about to start clawing each other’s eyes out, but then their friends were stepping between them, forcibly separating the two and gently reminding them that this was not the time to be fighting. Emma regained her composure first, looking down at her hand and wincing as she saw her little Sophie clinging desperately to her fingers, realising the unpleasant ride that she’d been giving the tiny woman during the argument.

For her part the battered bride was just happy that the rollercoaster ride of Emma’s rage had finally burned out. She could see that her love was sorry for what she had done, and found it difficult to hold a grudge when she knew that the anger had all been on her behalf. If she was able to speak she’d have let her fiancé know she was forgiven, but settled for communicating her intent through her eyes. If the sweet smile she received in response was any indication, Emma understood.

Jasmine took longer to compose herself but eventually settled for a sullen glare as she waited for a better explanation for the treatment she had endured. The other bridesmaids gathered around, looking on in curiosity as Emma moved her hands to gently cradle the reforming Sophie.

Taking a deep brief to get her bearings, the bride spared a brief smile for her friends as she tried once again to explain the situation. “This is my fiancé Sophie. She’s kind of squished right now but if you just give her the chance she’ll pop back to normal in no time.” She ran a finger over her future wife’s body, giggling softly at the shudder that produced. “I know it’s hard to believe but she’s a real living breathing human, just kind of super tiny and able to survive things no normal human can.”

The others looked sceptical but watched without comment as Emma set her bride down on the nearest table, giving her one last gentle stroke before turning away. “Just let her be for the moment. When’s she’s back to normal make sure she’s ready for our big day, okay?” She turned towards the four girls who had been assigned as Sophie’s bridesmaids, Jasmine included. “Especially you four, I’m relying on you to look after her okay.”

In her flattened state, Sophie was just barely able to watch the conversation unfold, noting the four women who had been assigned as her escorts as they shot varied looks in her direction.

She was, of course, already more than familiar with Jasmine, having got much more intimate with the tanned woman’s butt than she’d ever wanted to be. Now able to look at her fully the tiny woman noted her long black hair and piercing eyes that seemed to be looking at her with unbridled hate, no doubt still sore over the earlier incident and unable to accept the little thing before her as anything more than a doll. More than anything, Sophie hoped that she could stay well away from that woman.

Standing just to the left of Jasmine was a tall well-built redhead with pale skin, and Sophie instantly recognised her as the other bridesmaid who had unintentionally sat on her earlier. Like most of the bridesmaids she had a remarkably generous rear and amble bosom, bursting at the seams of her too-tight dress. If Sophie recalled correctly this woman’s name was Kristina, but she wasn’t sure how she felt about the almost amused gaze she wore as her eyes raked across the tiny bride.

The other two women that Emma had indicated as her bridesmaids Sophie hadn’t met yet. One was a shorter Asian, who she would later learn was named Akiko. The Japanese woman had smaller curves than her compatriots, but they were still beyond those of the average woman, and the broad smile on her face suggested she was full of energy for her friend’s big day. The last was a younger-looking curvaceously athletic blonde, with long hair reaching almost to her waist, called Liz. There was a vague similarity to Ashlie in her bored-looking facial features so she was most likely a relative.

If Emma noticed the less than accepting looks from her friends she didn’t mention them, simply gathering up her own bridesmaids and making to leave. On the way out she kissed her hand and reached down to pat Sophie with it, but tripped over the hem of her dress at the last moment and ended up slamming her hand down on the tiny bride with much more force than she had intended. Par for the course for Emma, she didn’t even realise what she had done, too focused on regaining her balance to realise the damage she had done as she departed the room with her bridesmaids, leaving behind her flattened fiancé at the mercy of her friends.

143113.content:
As soon as Emma left the room, Kristina broke down laughing, joined soon after by Akiko and Liz as the three young women looked down in amusement at the little toy their friend had left behind. For a moment they’d almost been convinced that the bride genuinely cared about the squishy little thing, alive or not, but then she’d casually crushed it on the way out the door and any lingering doubts had been vanished from their minds. This was just a squishy doll. A little prank and nothing more.

Well if Emma thought she was going to catch them playing host to this thing she’d be surely mistaken. It was obvious that the real, human-sized, Sophie was just running a little bit late, so they’d just have to stay here and wait for her to arrive. Still, there was no harm in having some fun with the doll while they waited. As Kristina finally got her laughter under control she reached out for the little thing, intent on giving it a more thorough examination out of curiosity alone.

For Sophie the laughter of the towering women filed her with dread, since she knew well enough from previous experiences what it indicated. They hadn’t believed Emma, which meant the best she could hope for is that they would just leave her alone or, failing that, that they’d give her he opportunity she needed to show them she was alive. As Kristina’s massive hand closed in, the tiny bride tried desperately to move her flattened limbs to signal that she was indeed alive and raise her voice in warning.

But before the redhead’s reach could even get halfway there Jasmine, her face still set in an angry scowl, got in first, snatching up Sophie without a care for the feeble movements she had managed and hurling her to the ground. The unfortunate tiny collided solidly with the hard timbers of the changing room floor, squishing out slightly and undoing any progress she had made towards reforming. To her horror she had landed face-up and could only watch in despair as the bare tanned foot of her tormentor descending towards her.

To her credit, as she brought her foot down with colossal force, Jasmine had no idea that she was squishing a real human being. She was entirely convinced that the little head that flattened into nothing beneath the heel of her foot, even as the rest of its body was steamrolled under her sole, belonged to nothing more than a stupid little doll that Emma used to pull a stupid little prank that had ended with her flat on her ass. Right now she just needed to release her anger before the ceremony, and the best way to do that in her mind was to show this damn toy who was boss.

The other bridesmaids watched on in amusement as Jasmine stomped on the now thoroughly squished women over and over again, her feet a blur of motion as she practically marched in place over the flattened toy. Kristina in particular giggled mirthfully at the wet squelching sound that emanated from Sophie’s body as she was worked into dough by the bridesmaid’s unforgiving feet, though from the way they were clutching at their sides Akiko and Liz were obviously equally amused.

Soon amusement turned to curiosity, and the other girls approached Jasmine to have their own turns with the doll. Though somewhat reluctant to share, the tanned woman had calmed down enough to comply as the number of feet squishing Sophie suddenly increased from two to eight, what had already been a storm of sweat and pain becoming a maelstrom of feet pounding her into the floor. If she had any strength left at all she would have used it to cry and beg for mercy, but all she could do was lay there and take it as the merciless women crushed her into paste.

After nearly two full minutes of continuous footfalls, Akiko’s long slender toes suddenly clamped down around the remains of Sophie’s head, crushing the tiny bride’s face into the warm sweaty flesh between her toes before lifting her into the air and raising her above the nearest stool. Her friends looked on in curiosity as the shorter woman slammed her foot down on the stool and rubbed it back and forth for a few moments before lifting it away to reveal a flattened and mangled sticker of a bride cartoonishly emblazoned across the colourful fabric.

Even Jasmine laughed at this, joining her friends in their mirth as they looked down at the slowly reforming Sophie. Unwilling to give their toy any mercy, Akiko shot her friends a smirk before turning and allowing herself to fall backwards onto the stool, briefly filling Sophie’s vision with the sight of her tight panty-clad butt before promptly squishing the tiny woman flat beneath her generous rear. With a quick grind back and forth to rub salt in the wound, the bridesmaid sprung back to her feet, stepping aside to allow Kristina to take her place as the overflowing ass of the massive redhead descended on their defenceless victim. For the next fifteen minutes Sophie was subjected to a never-ending barrage of feet, butts, boobs and other body parts as the bridesmaids came up with increasingly inventive ways to play with their new toy as they waited patiently for their assigned bride to arrive. She had been crushed between Liz and Akiko’s posteriors as the two girls tried to push each other over with their butts alone, buried deep in Kristina’s cleavage as she jogged on the spot, used to floss out the gunk between each of Akiko’s toes, and used as a sweat rag for every part of Jasmine’s body imaginable, among many other things.

Eventually though, the now unrecognisably mangled bride ended up back where she had begun, buried beneath the overwhelming mass of Jasmine’s butt. After all by this point it just kind of smelled like her, thoroughly marked as her territory, almost an extension of her own body.

Maybe today was the day to let go though. Right now there was no-one else here, and she doubted the gym would even notice if she ‘borrowed’ one of their high-quality mats. The main issue then was just which one to pick from the sea of identical copies, though that decision was pretty much made for her as she looked down at her next target and saw a little smiley face drawn on the corner, the silly gesture making her smile despite herself. She still wasn’t quite decided on whether she would take a mat or not, but now she was sure that if she did it just had to be this one. Already she was picturing the exercise binge she could go on to break it in and mark it as hers, gleefully imagining that smiley face morphing into a frown as her liquid essence soaked into the fabric.

Sophie of course had no idea what was going on, and just stared up at the well-toned brunette towering above her. Though the tiny girl’s vision was blurry she could still see well enough to know that this woman was drop-dead gorgeous, toned muscles offset against prominent curves and long hair pulled back into a stylish ponytail. The pretty face of the twenty something woman gazed down at her with a pleasant smile while Sophie could only stare back in utter confusion, unaware that her future now hinged on the decision this woman was about to make regarding her new home.

The yoga instructor looked down thoughtfully at the smiley faced yoga mat for a few moments, unaware that the barely visible smear on it was a terrified and totally helpless woman looking back from her one good eye. Eventually she shook her head “nah not worth getting fired over” she muttered to herself before putting Sophie’s mat on the growing pile. Her vision of the ceiling didn’t last long as an identical mat was placed on top of the one holding her so perfectly captive. Then she felt the weight of another, then another before the muffled sounds of feet walking away from the pile could be heard, then silence. Sophie prayed that Emma was coming back to rescue her from this hellish existence, her worn out, battered beyond recognition body finally giving up as she slipped into unconsciousness.

Hours earlier however, Ashlie had set her plan of letting Sophie slip from her sisters mind the moment they left the gym. She had commented to her sister about how stressed she looked and how she would feel horrible tomorrow with stress and muscle ache, so she told her she was treating her to a sisterly spa day until the classes were over. Emma had never been one to turn down pampering so had reluctantly agreed, glancing back nervously at the gym not wanting to leave Sophie there all day, but she knew she had no hope of finding her while yoga classes kept starting. While Sophie had been crushed and smeared by a dozen women, her wife and her sadistic sister had been pampered to a state of euphoric bliss. Emma felt so relaxed and calm, she forgot what she had been stressing about. Before her sister could remember, Ashlie had suggested going to see a movie together, keeping her mind from drifting back to her tiny crushed wife.

Once the three hour movie had ended the gym had been shut for over an hour, but Ashlie dragged her sister out to a nearby bar for some drinks, getting her nice and blackout drunk. Emma was so drunk that she slept well past noon the next day and couldn’t even piece together what she did the day before. She spent the rest of the day recovering before realising she hadn’t seen Sophie all day. She got Ashlie to help search the house for her desperately but while they were searching, Sophie was back at the gym being smeared more
into and over the yoga mat by sweaty women with no rescue in sight.

“She has to be here somewhere” Emma exclaimed in desperation, it was getting on to late evening and she had turned the house upside down looking for her wife, unaware Sophie had recently been put away with the yoga mats at the gym for the second night in a row. Ashlie pretended to look thoughtful “well where do you remember seeing her last sis?” She asked as if she didn’t know where she was either, she was such an artful liar, the devil himself would be convinced by her words. Emma looked panicked as her eyes went wide “oh god I don’t remember seeing her since the wedding!” She said, Ashlie had to try her best to hold back laughter, her ditzy sister didn’t even remember taking Sophie to the gym, her plan had worked better than she had hoped. “Ok ok so maybe she got stuck to one of the guests. They are bound to spot a little woman in a wedding dress sooner or later, calm down” she said hugging her sister comfortingly, grinning behind her back. “But Ashlie, we are meant to leave for our honeymoon tomorrow. The plane leaves in the morning!” She said. Ashlie did her best to look sincere as she looked her sister in the eyes. “You spent a lot of money on those tickets Emma, you can’t not go” “But Sophie...” “Will turn up! She wouldn’t want them to go to waste either. Tell you what, I’ll use her ticket, keep you company on holiday and I bet by the time we get back, Sophie will be home.” She said with an assuring smile on her lips.

Emma didn’t like the idea of leaving Sophie behind but her sister had a point, the honeymoon had cost a lot of money and one of the guests would spot Sophie in her white dress if she was stuck to something. Reassured, Emma and Ashlie both packed their suitcases for what Ashlie kept calling a holiday. Early morning they were off, Ashlie doing her best to keep her sisters mind off Sophie. Over the next two weeks, Emma and Ashlie tanned on tropical beaches while Emmas poor wife was crushed and smeared relentless by exotic beauty’s. they went out for drinks at fun clubs while she drank up sweat and grime from the endless yoga classes. The sisters got full body massages at the hotel spa while Sophie’s mat got scrubbed weekly by gym staff, scrubbing her harder into the yoga mat as they cleaned off the smell of sweat.

Ashlie had done everything in her power to keep her sisters mind off of her tiny wife during the trip and by the time they were flying back, even Emma was referring to the trip as a sisters holiday rather than her honeymoon. Her wife’s absence had totally slipped her mind. To add horror to Sophie’s situation and destroy any hope of rescue, Ashlie saw a new state of the art gym had opened up closer than the one they had left Sophie at and convinced Emma to switch gyms with her, ensuring she wouldn’t go back and spot Sophie’s smear of a captive body.

The months began to pass by as Sophie’s hellish life as a yoga mat stain continued, by now she had been smeared so much she covered over half the mat, not that anyone would know. It had been over a week since she had been crushed so thin that her body was actually transparent, there was no sign of a stain to show her body as woman after woman used her to do their yoga classes. She desperately wanted to see Emma again and be rescued, it seems Ashlie’s plan had worked, no one treated her like anything but a yoga mat anymore. Eventually it had been a year to the day since you had been reduced to a butt cushion for the gyms yoga lovers and you were well and truly broken, you had given up hope of ever getting to move, to talk, to be seen as a person. You were fused so well with the mat you didn’t even know where it ended and you began. Is this your life forever, or will a miracle end this torment?

15322111111121231221.content:
Six more months had passed since Ashlie put her plan into action to keep Sophie in constant torture under the gym's yoga practitioners. Since that fateful day, Emma had looked everywhere for her missing wife, mistakenly believing she hadn't seen her since their wedding day. She had dug up the phone numbers and addresses of everyone she had invited to the wedding, searched her whole body multiple times, and even convinced Ashlie to check her own body once or twice. She was in the middle of turning the house upside down for the dozenth time when Ashlie decided it was finally the right moment to put the final step of her plan into action.

"Sis, I hate to say this, but I think Sophie might be gone for good after all."

"No, she can't be! There must be something I haven't thought of, some detail about the wedding I'm still overlooking!"

"Emma."

Ashlie looked pointedly into her sister's eyes, pausing for a moment before continuing to speak. This was it.

"...It's been what. Seventeen months now? Eighteen? Before this, what was the longest time you ever lost Sophie for?"

Emma looked sheepishly down at her feet before mumbling,

"...A month."

"I think..." Ashlie chose her next words carefully. "I think this probably isn't just a simple disappearance at this point. You really have looked everywhere."

"But-"

"No buts, Emma. Think about it. If you still haven't found her by now, don't you think maybe... she didn't want to be found after the wedding after all? That she realized the pressure of a marriage was too much for her?"

"It can't be!! It just can't!" Emma burst into tears all over again, half-heartedly turning over a couch cushion and looking underneath it before sulking off to her bedroom. Ashlie waited until Emma had left the room before rubbing her hands together in contemplation. Almost there.

---

After so much pain and despair, Sophie, by this point... had forgotten most things. She had largely forgotten what life was like beyond the four walls of the yoga studio. What it was like to be a person, and not just a mat for other people to stretch their generous curves on top of. As the current day's yoga classes dragged on, you found yourself lost in the feeling of being sat on. It was so familiar to you now, it really didn't bother you anymore. It was just... your life. As you sat in immobile silence, you focused on what you could feel at that moment. The legs and feet of the woman currently sitting cross-legged on top of you, for one thing. But much more of your rectangular body, and your thoughts, were occupied with the woman's sizeable rear end. At this point, you knew this woman's booty like the back of your hand. ...Hand? Yoga mats don't have those, you thought to yourself. You knew it like the back of your... well, you knew it really well, anyway. This pink-haired girl, who you had learned was named Jess, always came in towards the end of the day to wind down with a quick yoga routine. In case you weren't already certain it was her, you could be sure as soon as you tasted the unique flavor of her buttsweat. You remembered when you used to hate the taste of women's sweat, how it used to make you want to gag, though you couldn't without a mouth. But you grew to like it in time. You enjoyed it so much, in fact, that each day you looked forward to sampling the bouquet of scents each woman had to offer. Maybe if you were lucky, today she would even...

She did! A small gust of wind escaped her crack, and you scrambled to soak in as much of it as you could. If her dead skin and sweat was the main course, her gas was like a delicious dessert. You thanked the heavens, and your current mistress, that you were allowed such divine pleasure. You hoped this would never end.

---

As the credits rolled, Emma turned off the rom-com she and her sister had been watching and stood up. Blowing her still runny nose, she said,

"You know what, Ashlie? You're right. I need to move on with my life. I'm sure Sophie has moved on to a better life too, even if it's without me. It still hurts, but I'll heal in time. I know it."

"That's the spirit, Em! It's been a long day, so why don't you get some rest, and we can start your new life tomorrow morning with something fun!"

"Good idea, Ash! You always know just what to say. You're the best sister ever!"

As the two sisters embraced, a wicked smile flashed across Ashlie's face. She had finally done it. Emma was once again hers and hers alone, and she intended to keep it that way this time.

---

"...just sign here, and you're good to go. Thanks."

Sophie awoke somewhere unfamiliar. It was dark, and there were yoga mats piled on top of her like there were every morning, but something felt very different. As a truck motor sprang to life in the distance, she knew this was not going to be a normal day for her.

You weren't sure how long you were on the truck (time was hard to measure for you anymore), but after some time you felt the stack you were in being loaded up onto a moving belt, one mat at a time. You and your fellow mats traveled along this strange and confusing path, until you felt something even more bizarre in the distance. Heat. Not just the regular body heat of one of your mistresses, either. Things were getting really, really hot. The heat began to override every other sensation you could possibly feel, until suddenly... you felt nothing at all.

---

It took Ashlie a good fifteen minutes to find the yoga studio. It had been a while since she had last set foot in here, ever since she had switched gyms to keep Sophie off of Emma's mind. But here it was. She waited until the yoga class in session let out, checked to make sure the coast was clear, and then began the little speech she'd prepared.

"Sooophie~! Long time no see, huh? I'm sure you miss your darling Emma, but she had to work today. Lucky for you, I stopped by to say hello! I... don't actually have any way of knowing which of these mats you are, but I'm sure you can hear me. Guess what? She's given up on you. You get to be a yoga mat, forever! Enjoy your new life, you little ass cushion!" To emphasize her point, Ashlie dropped down onto the nearest mat and wiggled her butt around a little bit. It probably wasn't the mat Sophie was in, but she could at least pretend. Though, now that she thought about it, these mats were a light grey. Hadn't the mats in here been blue before...?

---

Somehow, Sophie slowly felt the sensation of her senses returning to her. Her body felt a little bit different though. Whereas before her consciousness only took up about half of her yoga mat body, now she could feel everything across the whole mat, all at once. She also felt much cleaner, the ever-present ingrained smell of dirt and sweat now mysteriously absent. Oh well, she thought, that could be fixed soon enough.

And soon enough it was. After a month at your new gym home, you were back to your usual self, feeling the same old pressure as your current mistress's colossal boobs flattened you into the floor. You greedily sucked up all the sweat that leaked through her top, as you had grown so used to doing. This was the life.

---

"You can do it, Emma dear! Just one more set of sit-ups to go, and then we'll be done, I promise!"

"Alright, Roxy, but you know I'm not as limber as I used to be."

Emma. That name sounded oddly familiar. A mistress from a few gyms ago, perhaps? Sophie knew somehow that that name was special, but how could one of the goddesses that crushed her daily be any more wonderful than any other? Perhaps her gas had been particularly delicious. With how many times she had been reborn and moved to a new home, it was getting hard to remember anything that had happened too many cycles ago.

A now much older Emma did her best to power through the last few reps her second wife had talked her into doing. As she neared the end, the force of pulling her body up from a reclining position suddenly caused her to accidentally let out a small fart.

"Ugh, gross! I know I told you to exert yourself, but that wasn't what I meant, Em."

Emma could only blush in embarrassment, completely unaware that her previous wife was as close to her now as she'd ever been, breathing in the raw essence of her recent emission and savoring every second of it. The two brides would never have recognized each other like this, with Sophie's physical features long having melted away. She was nothing more than a consciousness embedded into plastic and fabric now, and no one would ever know she was more than a simple exercise mat, not even Ashlie. To her, Emma was just a new favorite mistress, one with the tastiest sweat and farts that she could remember in a long time. Until the day decades later when her soul finally grew too weak to survive the recycling process anymore, the only thought Sophie had of Emma was a deep desire to breathe in more of her wonderful bodily odors.

The closet door opened, light shining so brightly that you were momentarily blinded. As your vision came back you saw Emma looking through her clothing before her eyes stopped at you, not recognising the dress. She let out a little sigh and lifted the hanger that you were draped from out the closet, holding you up. In her other hand she held up the letter Ashlie had forged. “This is really what you want? I know, I know, your letter said to treat you like a normal dress but I had to talk to you. This is crazy, you want to try being my dress? We haven’t even been on our honeymoon yet.” She added with a sad pout. You shook a bit as she shrugged her shoulders “But fine if this is what you want to try, I’ll pack you with the rest of my clothes and Ashlie can use your ticket.” She said, sounding annoyed. You couldn’t believe it, Emma has believed the letter. This was bad, woven so tightly as you were, you had absolutely no way of telling your wife the truth, all you could do was hope you would somehow unravel, but that seemed unlikely.

With that said, she tossed you on to the bed and unzipped her suitcase. It was filled with her work stuff, so she took that out before slipping you off the hanger, folding you without a word and tucking you inside the now empty suitcase. You wanted to cry but even that ability was robbed from you by Ashlie’s cruel trap. It wasn’t long before you were buried in dresses, skirts, towels and bikinis as Emma filled up her suitcase ready for, what had been your honeymoon and was now a sisters holiday.

From inside the packed suitcase you couldn’t hear anything, fabric pressed tight around you but you felt vibrations as Emma walked away. True to the letters demands, she was treating you like a normal dress, packed up the night before the flight and left alone in the suitcase without a word. Your mind was whirring in panic a mile a minute, but eventually sleep claimed you. When you awoke there was a lot of vibrations, you weren’t sure what was going on, though Emma had just handed her suitcase off to the airport staff and you were travelling along a conveyor belt with all the other suitcases and their contents.

While Ashlie enjoyed your first class seat and free champagne, you were tucked away in the cargo gold feeling the turbulence rattle the plane around for hours and hours. Eventually however, even the flight ended and you all arrived. Checking into the hotel Emma swapped the room for one with two large beds, a bellhop carrying the bags up to the room. The pressure around you lessened as you heard the suitcase being unzipped and Ashlie’s muffled voice “ooh sis look, this place has its own spa. We should do get a massage later before we go out for drinks” you heard her say as Emma began hanging her clothing up in the closet. “Yeah that sounds nice. Gotta be relaxed before I get out on the dance floor” she said, slipping you into a hanger with barely a glance.

You mentally sobbed as Ashlie said “ooh you should wear your new red dress for dancing, you’ll have everyone staring at you in that thing” and the slight glare in Emma’s eyes as she looked at you “maybe I will...” she said before closing the closet door on you, putting you back into darkness. “I’m going to put you in my shoe okay. That way I won’t be sitting on you the entire flight.” Emma seemed pleased with her reasoning, smiling happily as she reached down to remove her right heel. Sophie wasn’t so sure, and wanted to know why the only options were being sat on or stuck in a shoe, but she wasn’t given the chance to ask before being picked up and dropped into the waiting heel, a smile and a wave the only communication she received before her wife shoved her nylon-clad foot back into the shoe, catching the tiny girl with her toes and shoving her into the very tip.

While Emma was just sitting in the car the pressure beneath her toes was negligible, but the ditzy blonde had dropped her tiny bride into her driving shoe and the pressure soon increased as she pressed down on the accelerator and began the long drive to the airport. Sophie quickly found herself compacted into the space beneath her wife’s toes, squeezed rhythmically each time the heavy foot above stepped down on either pedal and bathed in the all too familiar scent of Emma’s feet. Worse, even when she wasn’t actively pressing down on the pedals, the blonde was tapping her foot in time to whatever song was playing to the radio, the presence of Sophie already seeming to have fled her mind as she played with the squishy lump of flesh keeping her toes company.

Sophie just hoped that Emma remembered her when they arrived at the airport, or at least by the time they got to Hawaii. There had been far too many incidents in the past when a quick trip in a shoe had turned into days of being used as a squishy insole for her girlfriend/fiancé. One particular incident had seen her taken on a family vacation with Emma and her family, but never once getting the chance to meet anyone else as she spent the whole month tending to the blonde’s feet. Another time she had endured an entire marathon as an insole, and had then been left plastered to her girlfriend’s sweaty sole for another three days before finally peeling free. Needless to say, Sophie was in no hurry to relive any of those experiences.

Fortunately, by the time they arrived at the airport, Emma seemed to have finally recalled her wife’s location, taking a moment to attempt to give Sophie a soothing rub before heading into the lobby. Of course all she really accomplished was crushing the squishy girl further into her sweaty nylon but her intent was understood and appreciated nonetheless. In the twenty-one years she’d been alive, Sophie had never managed to figure out how her body actually worked. When she wasn’t being squashed, or recovering from the same, she functioned much the same as an ordinary human, albeit at a much smaller scale. She wasn’t any stronger or faster than her size would otherwise suggest. She breathed, ate and perspired just the same as everyone else. And she perceived the world through the usual senses.

And yet, when her body was exposed to a force that would otherwise inflict damage it instead flattened out, even against pressures that should otherwise have pierced right through. This could be limited to a single body part, in which case the flattening would undo itself relatively quickly, or extend to her whole body, and once she was in this state her functionality changed completely.

Though she could go through the motions of breathing and such (often to her distinct disadvantage) her body no longer required even such basic functions to endure and could persist for weeks on end without deteriorating. She’d almost inevitably find herself attached to whatever object had crushed her, or to the object she’d been crushed against, with her body taking on a gum like and sticky quality. Worse yet, even if her eyes and ears were squashed her senses of touch, smell and taste seemed inexorable, able to continue functioning long after they should reasonably have ceased.

In the course of her life she’d been stuck to nearly everything imaginable. She’d been reduced to a logo on countless pairs of pants, served as a bit of extra padding for countless insoles, been crammed into armpits, squished under boobs, and even chewed on like a piece of gum. Her squished body had been turned into a smear on chairs, floor mats, sex toys, and everything in-between. She wasn’t sure what the longest period she’d been stuck for was, but it was at least a few months.

In other words, just being Sophie sometimes felt like a constant cycle of pain and humiliation.

Nevertheless, it was times like this that the tiny woman was glad, presuming she could do nothing about her size, to have a body like hers. Anything else would have died in the smelly confines of Min-seo’s sneakers, never again to see the people it cared about. Yet here she was, painfully pulling herself free from the last few sock fibres and rolling onto the table’s surface. She was still covered in sweat and her body wasn’t anywhere near healed enough to stand, but she was free and finally able to get a breath of air that wasn’t tainted by the smell of her new friend’s pungent feet.

Laying there staring at the ceiling, the tiny girl had nothing to do but reflect on her circumstances as her limbs and chest slowly started to inflate, wondering how exactly she’d ended up here and why even after everything she’d experienced she was still happy. Well, that last part wasn’t so hard, she was happy because she was with Emma, and even if she’d invited someone else to come along on their honeymoon, the blonde had been thinking of Sophie when she did so. And it wasn’t like she disliked Min-seo, in fact she was actually really happy to have made a friend outside of Emma, since everyone else who had ever been nice to her had drifted away sooner or later.

She’d never really been able to get on with her family. From birth she’d been treated more as an unfortunate burden than a real member of the family, and she was pretty sure the only reason they kept her around at all was for the money they got for the experiments they allowed people to run on her when she was younger. Rightfully, of course, that money belonged to Sophie, but the last time she’d seen her mother the woman had been talking about making her tiny daughter a permanent tattoo on her voluptuous rear, rather than let her marry that ‘harlot’ so… yeah, they could keep it. No amount money was worth the risk of going anywhere near those people again.

Lost in her thoughts, Sophie wasn’t sure how much time had passed by the time she finally rose to her feet and looked around the room, though it must have been at least half an hour. Long enough it seemed for her companions to return as she heard the distinct sound of the door being unlocked.

A slender finger pointed to the light. “This is an alarm. It’s set to buzz the watch every thirty minutes. And every time it buzzes it’s going to remind me to check where you are. Despite herself, Sophie laughed, knowing that Min-seo’s impromptu narration was all too likely with her luck. “You’re surprisingly more of a dork than I’d expected.” She smiled. “It’s a good idea though.” Really, she was just happy that the other girl cared enough to come up with something like this.

The self-satisfied smirk that came to Min-seo’s face would have been terrifying in any other circumstance. “Thanks. So… do you want to head down to the pool? Emma’s fallen asleep getting a tan but I’m sure she’d be happy to see you. Of course if you’d rather stay here I understand.” As much as she was finding herself enjoying the company of this tiny girl she didn’t want to push her luck and risk alienating either her or Emma any more than she already had.

Sophie returned the smirk with one of her own. “If I don’t, are you going to come back to check on me every thirty minutes?” She laughed again at the thumbs-up she received in response. “Well…”
